featured.text: Admission for guests with special needs is free, and fees for the general public are set at a much discounted price so that people of all ages and abilities can come together and play in a fun and safe environment.

definition.zh_def: 折扣，指在原價基礎上減少的金額或百分比。
definition.en_def: A reduction in the usual price of something.
definition.example: The store is offering a 20% discount on all shoes this weekend.
